
<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"><tbody><tr><td class="t_f" id="postmessage_52489822">
<i class="pstatus"> 本帖最后由 lan_yu 于 2025-2-28 16:25 编辑 </i><br>
<br>
RustDesk 是一个远程桌面软件，提供了自托管的解决方案，用宝塔面板部署在自托管服务上非常方便快捷和安全，方法如下，仅供参考。<br>
<br>
 一、准备工作：<br>
<br>
1、服务器安装好宝塔面板（略），并安装好相应的应用软件，如MYSQL，进程守护管理器等<br>

<ignore_js_op>

<img aid="2757840" src="https://attach.52pojie.cn/forum/202502/28/161133i9bkcd9lbbj939cl.png" zoomfile="https://attach.52pojie.cn/forum/202502/28/161133i9bkcd9lbbj939cl.png" file="https://attach.52pojie.cn/forum/202502/28/161133i9bkcd9lbbj939cl.png" class="zoom" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" width="865" id="aimg_2757840" inpost="1">

<div class="tip tip_4 aimg_tip" id="aimg_2757840_menu" style="position: absolute; display: none" disautofocus="true">

</ignore_js_op>
<br>
<br>

<ignore_js_op>

</ignore_js_op>
<br>
<br>
2、添加mysql数据库<br>

<ignore_js_op>

<img aid="2757842" src="https://attach.52pojie.cn/forum/202502/28/161209ybfkwsnkn5w8f55r.png" zoomfile="https://attach.52pojie.cn/forum/202502/28/161209ybfkwsnkn5w8f55r.png" file="https://attach.52pojie.cn/forum/202502/28/161209ybfkwsnkn5w8f55r.png" class="zoom" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" width="864" id="aimg_2757842" inpost="1">

<div class="tip tip_4 aimg_tip" id="aimg_2757842_menu" style="position: absolute; display: none" disautofocus="true">

<p>

</p>

<p class="xg1 y">2025-2-28 16:12 上传</p>

</div>
<div class="tip_horn"></div>
</div>

</ignore_js_op>
<br>
<br>
记录好数据库名，用户名，密码等备用。<br>
<br>
 二、部署服务端：<br>
<br>
1、下载地址（目前最新版本1.1.14）：https://github.com/rustdesk/rustdesk-server/releases/tag/1.1.14<br>

<ignore_js_op>

<img aid="2757843" src="https://attach.52pojie.cn/forum/202502/28/161244i0u820tigcgj4r0e.png" zoomfile="https://attach.52pojie.cn/forum/202502/28/161244i0u820tigcgj4r0e.png" file="https://attach.52pojie.cn/forum/202502/28/161244i0u820tigcgj4r0e.png" class="zoom" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" width="865" id="aimg_2757843" inpost="1">

<div class="tip tip_4 aimg_tip" id="aimg_2757843_menu" style="position: absolute; display: none" disautofocus="true">

</div>
<div class="tip_horn"></div>
</div>

</ignore_js_op>
<br>
<br>
2、将下载的文件上传到服务器并解压得到两个文件hbbr和hbbs<br>

<ignore_js_op>

<br>
3、将这两个文件加入到“进程守护管理器”并运行<br>

4、开启端口21115-21119<br>

<ignore_js_op>

<br>
<br>
<br>
到此rustdesk服务端程序已安装好。<br>
<br>
<br>
三、部署rustdesk API及后台管理<br>
<br>
这一步用<strong>bulesky</strong>大神的代码实现<br>
<br>
1、下载地址（目前最新版本2.6.12）：https://github.com/lejianwen/rustdesk-api/releases/tag/v2.6.12<br>

<ignore_js_op>

<img aid="2757855" src="https://attach.52pojie.cn/forum/202502/28/161527iigvrjxrdvuk78ui.png" zoomfile="https://attach.52pojie.cn/forum/202502/28/161527iigvrjxrdvuk78ui.png" file="https://attach.52pojie.cn/forum/202502/28/161527iigvrjxrdvuk78ui.png" class="zoom" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" width="865" id="aimg_2757855" inpost="1">

<div class="tip tip_4 aimg_tip" id="aimg_2757855_menu" style="position: absolute; display: none" disautofocus="true">
<div class="xs0">
<p><strong>image.png</strong> <em class="xg1">(86.39 KB, 下载次数: 1)</em></p>

</p>

<p class="xg1 y">2025-2-28 16:15 上传</p>

</div>
<div class="tip_horn"></div>
</div>

</ignore_js_op>
<br>
<br>
<br>
2、将下载的文件上传至宝塔服务器并解压得到release文件夹<br>

<ignore_js_op>

<img aid="2757856" src="https://attach.52pojie.cn/forum/202502/28/161537uv0gooqvoejbjgog.png" zoomfile="https://attach.52pojie.cn/forum/202502/28/161537uv0gooqvoejbjgog.png" file="https://attach.52pojie.cn/forum/202502/28/161537uv0gooqvoejbjgog.png" class="zoom" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" width="865" id="aimg_2757856" inpost="1">

</ignore_js_op>
<br>
<br>
<br>
3、修改配置文件<br>
<br>
修改release → conf文件夹下的config.yaml文件<br>
<br>
修改gorm类型为“mysql”，并填入前面设置的数据库名称、用户名、密码等信息。<br>

<ignore_js_op>

<img aid="2757857" src="https://attach.52pojie.cn/forum/202502/28/161553vwxvwwqnq333l3p2.png" zoomfile="https://attach.52pojie.cn/forum/202502/28/161553vwxvwwqnq333l3p2.png" file="https://attach.52pojie.cn/forum/202502/28/161553vwxvwwqnq333l3p2.png" class="zoom" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" width="865" id="aimg_2757857" inpost="1">

<div class="tip tip_4 aimg_tip" id="aimg_2757857_menu" style="position: absolute; display: none" disautofocus="true">
<div class="xs0">
<p><strong>image.png</strong> <em class="xg1">(232.35 KB, 下载次数: 1)</em></p>
<p>

</p>

<p class="xg1 y">2025-2-28 16:15 上传</p>

</div>
<div class="tip_horn"></div>
</div>

</ignore_js_op>
<br>
<br>
<br>
4、部署GO项目<br>
<br>
（1）添加SDK软件包<br>

<ignore_js_op>

<img aid="2757859" src="https://attach.52pojie.cn/forum/202502/28/161621iadr6r3ziwk8rtt3.png" zoomfile="https://attach.52pojie.cn/forum/202502/28/161621iadr6r3ziwk8rtt3.png" file="https://attach.52pojie.cn/forum/202502/28/161621iadr6r3ziwk8rtt3.png" class="zoom" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" width="865" id="aimg_2757859" inpost="1">

<br>
<br>
（2）添加GO项目<br>

<ignore_js_op>

<img aid="2757860" src="https://attach.52pojie.cn/forum/202502/28/161649j45mf207zh7jjl2v.png" zoomfile="https://attach.52pojie.cn/forum/202502/28/161649j45mf207zh7jjl2v.png" file="https://attach.52pojie.cn/forum/202502/28/161649j45mf207zh7jjl2v.png" class="zoom" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" width="865" id="aimg_2757860" inpost="1">

<div class="tip tip_4 aimg_tip" id="aimg_2757860_menu" style="position: absolute; display: none" disautofocus="true">

</p>

<p class="xg1 y">2025-2-28 16:16 上传</p>

</div>
<div class="tip_horn"></div>
</div>

</ignore_js_op>
<br>
<br>
<br>
项目执行文件选择release文件夹下的apimain文件，项目端口填21114，并勾选放行端口。<br>
<br>
至此API服务器已成功运行。<br>

<ignore_js_op>

<img aid="2757861" src="https://attach.52pojie.cn/forum/202502/28/161707pz4nvv87cti8keke.png" zoomfile="https://attach.52pojie.cn/forum/202502/28/161707pz4nvv87cti8keke.png" file="https://attach.52pojie.cn/forum/202502/28/161707pz4nvv87cti8keke.png" class="zoom" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" width="865" id="aimg_2757861" inpost="1">

</div>

</ignore_js_op>
<br>
<br>
<br>
